tool_description: Validates candidate education credentials against job requirements, checking degrees, certifications, and educational institution quality.

allow_equivalent.description: Allow equivalent experience in lieu of formal education

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: candidate_degrees and candidate_institutions must have equal lengths
Empty education data: At least one degree and institution must be provided
Invalid education level: Use standard education level terminology
Invalid institution preference: Use one of [any, accredited, top_tier]
Certification format error: Provide certifications as clear, recognizable names
usage: Provide candidate education details and job requirements. The tool validates education credentials and provides qualification assessment.

meets_requirements.description: Whether candidate meets minimum education requirements

missing_certifications.description: Required certifications not possessed by candidate
